wxExListViewFileName Class Reference

Adds some standard lists, all these lists have items associated with files or folders. More...

#include <wx/extension/listview.h>

Detailed Description

Adds some standard lists, all these lists have items associated with files or folders.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum wxExListViewFileName::wxExListType

The supported lists.

Enumerator:
LIST_BEFORE_FIRST 

for iterating

LIST_FOLDER 

a list containing folders only

LIST_COUNT 

a list to show statistics

LIST_FIND 

a list to show find results

LIST_HISTORY 

a list to show history items

LIST_KEYWORD 

a list to show keywords

LIST_REPLACE 

a list to show replace results

LIST_PROCESS 

a list to show process output

LIST_FILE 

a list associated with a file

LIST_SQL 

a list to show embedded sql

LIST_VERSION 

a list to show versions

LIST_AFTER_LAST 

for iterating
